      • setDateFromDateFormatString

        public void setDateFromDateFormatString(java.lang.String date)
                                 throws java.text.ParseException
        Sets the date from string containing date in AppCommunicationConsts.DATE_FORMAT_APP format. Cuts off precision of milliseconds to avoid ambiguity.
        Parameters:
        date - is a string containing date in AppCommunicationConsts.DATE_FORMAT_APP format.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • getEventLevel

        public java.lang.String getEventLevel()
        Getter for the property containing level of the event. The level is defined by constants AppCommunicationConsts.DANGEROUS and AppCommunicationConsts.NORMAL.
        Returns:
        level of the event.

      • setEventLevel

        public void setEventLevel(java.lang.String eventLevel)
        Setter for the property containing level of the event.
        Parameters:
        eventLevel - one of constants AppCommunicationConsts.DANGEROUS and AppCommunicationConsts.NORMAL.
